element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm creates a new polygons layer with buffers around features in the input layer

element.name: LAYER
element.text: The layer with features to buffer

element.name: FIELD
element.text: If the buffer distance is taken from the attributes table of the layer, the field with the distance must be selected in this parameter

element.name: DISTANCE
element.text: If a fixed distance is used to buffer all features, it must be introduced in this field

element.name: METHOD
element.text: the following methods are available * Fixed distance: the same buffer distance for all features. * Distance from table field: buffer distance is taken from the attributes associated with each feature.

element.name: TYPE
element.text: The following methods are available * Inside the polygon: * Inside and outside the polygon: * Outside the polygon:

element.name: NOTROUNDED
element.text: If selected, resulting polygons will not be rounded
